summary: Rolling Stone is an American magazine about music, politics, and popular culture. It started in 1967 in San Francisco, covering rock music and politics. Over time, it changed its focus to appeal to younger readers, then went back to its original content. The magazine features famous people on its cover and is known for its bold photos. It has a website and international versions. Recently, the magazine faced challenges, leading to a change in ownership.
title: Rolling Stone
